title: Tootoot.fm Input Schema
description: Specify the date range for the events. You can use either the absolute date range or a relative one. If a relative date is provided, it will take precedence.

since.title: Start Date (Since)
since.description: The start of the date range. Can be an absolute date or a relative period.

till.title: End Date (Till)
till.description: The end of the date range. Can be an absolute date or a relative period.
